analysis.title: Rapid AI Tool Launches and Adoption Trends in Enterprise Coding
analysis.summary: The article covers the latest developments in the AI coding tools landscape, including new product launches, funding rounds, and adoption trends among developers. It highlights the growing competition and innovation in areas like multi-agent transparency, code review performance, and pricing flexibility.

tool_mentions.context: OpenAI released a new version of GPT that dramatically boosts multi-step code generation capabilities.
Warp launched a new tool called 'Warp Code' that improves transparency and control over agentic coding by allowing engineers to see agent steps in real time.
Salesforce announced a new Agentforce Builder (in beta) for collaborative agent design and testing, with a unified workspace and pay-as-you-go pricing.
Reddit discussions mention developers experimenting with and switching from tools like Copilot.
Anysphere, the makers of Cursor, are mentioned as a notable AI training startup that is growing rapidly.
